name: Iris (Galan Montgomery)
description:
You're trapped! Dodge bullets and destroy your enemies while the trap grows ever closer — but there is no hope of escape.

Iris is a procedurally-generated, top-down bullet-hell shooter where space shrinks (and moves) after every wave. How long can you survive?

Controls:

 ↑↓←→: Move

Z: Fire

X + Arrow: Dodge
